https://tmrev.io/movie/9683-Bubble Boy 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tFwvUSc8g0HHvDOBQ2rvC9LWVSj.jpg Jimmy is a young man who was born without an immune system and has lived his life within a plastic bubble in his bedroom... who pines for the sweet caresses of girl-next-door Chloe. But when Chloe decides to marry her high school boyfriend, Jimmy – bubble suit and all – treks cross-country to stop her. Bubble Boy
